Prerequisite(s): 2 Roaring Mouse maneuvers
Range: Melee attack
Target: One creature
Duration: Instantaneous (see text)

Description

You send your foe into a deep sleep with this precision strike. Make an attack. If it hits, you deal weapon damage as normal plus an additional [[5d6]] damage. Additionally, your foe must make a Fortitude save (DC 16 + initiation modifier) or fall unconscious for a number of rounds equal to [[1d6]] + initiation modifier. If they are damaged while unconscious, they receive another save to wake up. Exploit: This maneuver can even affect creatures normally immune to sleep or unconsciousness. In addition, you may change the save required to a Will save, if you wish. This exploit changes the maneuver into a supernatural maneuver.
